programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Eden’s fairy home. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: The Vikings of Berk suspect the dragons may be causing lightning storms in the village.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: Where's Wally?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.desc: When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks he's a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucy's behalf

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When Sherman tells a lie, Peabody wants to teach him that honesty is the best policy but discovers it's nearly impossible to always tell the truth

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition – Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus’ piano before his recital and he can’t practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.desc: Curtis Stone returns to the MasterChef kitchen tonight as, fresh from their service challenge win, Adi, Rue, Ralph, Rhiannon and Brent arrive for a two-round immunity challenge with a life-changing twist!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Despite it being a dreaded black-apron day today in the MasterChef Kitchen for our Top 10, there is also a ray of sunshine... in the form of guest judge Maggie Beer!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s explosive Mystery Box presents an exciting and challenging task for our Top 9 contestants – in 75 minutes, they must create a dish with an unexpected element to surprise the judges!

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: It’s Pressure Test time, and after plating up the bottom three dishes in the recent surprise Mystery Box challenge, Ralph, Malissa and Rhiannon must now set about cooking for their spot in the Top 8.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Taking inspiration from their surroundings - the Temple of Boom, an evocative reimagining of the ancient Greek Acropolis - the final eight split into two teams to add a contemporary twist to Greek food.

programme.title: Greed: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Interior decorator Zuri Maxwell has a dream career, a loving family and a good man, but greed threatens to destroy everything when she meets a handsome benefactor and his fabulously wealthy aunt.

programme.title: Wrath: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Single lawyer Chastity meets Xavier, who seems to be everything she is looking for in a partner, but his jealousy and anger lead to suspicious actions and dangerous threats.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Sam proposes doing a quick 30 day flip in Spring Hill, on a house she's been hired to sell, and the team jumps at the idea. But, once inside, the team soon realises "quick" doesn't always go with "easy".

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: The team scores a major deal when Dolmar is offered a low-price on a home in a desirable neighbourhood in South Tampa. After some debate, the decision is made to turn the home into a long-term rental.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The chefs face their toughest Mystery Box challenge yet – fish! When the chefs with immunity are able to switch up the other contestants’ fish, the competition starts to fire up.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: Contestants cater to the average sports fan while incorporating elements from their region, and the chef with immunity is tasked with giving a penalty to the home cook of their choosing.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining nine home cooks are tasked with firing up their grills and preparing a restaurant quality barbecue plate that is guaranteed to impress the judges.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The chefs face their biggest challenge yet: a 55-foot wall. The chef with immunity is tasked with pairing contestants to cook on opposite sides of the wall, where they must rely on great communication.

programme.title: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A young author buys the apartment of her dreams, but strange sounds begin to alarm her, along with a feeling of being watched. As she learns the history of the apartment, she uncovers a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Danger In The House
programme.desc: As his mother's illness progresses, a wealthy man hires a perfect caregiver. But their lives start to spiral into a deadly affair as the caregiver tries to make herself a permanent fixture.

programme.title: The Pregnancy Scheme
programme.desc: Pregnant and newly single, Julia faces a catastrophe when she loses her job. A lifeline arrives in the form of her new friend Alana, who says she knows people who would pay for positive pregnancy tests.

programme.title: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A young author buys the apartment of her dreams, but strange sounds begin to alarm her, along with a feeling of being watched. As she learns the history of the apartment, she uncovers a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Wrath: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Single lawyer Chastity meets Xavier, who seems to be everything she is looking for in a partner, but his jealousy and anger lead to suspicious actions and dangerous threats.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Mya and Kennedy moved from the big city to the small town of Front Royal, VA when Mya had an opportunity to buy her Grandmother's old home. After four years, they desperately need more space.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Nine years ago, Sonny and Kristin moved into their first house together. Since then, their family has grown with the birth of two boys. And now they are finding that their space no longer works for them.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The chefs face their toughest Mystery Box challenge yet – fish! When the chefs with immunity are able to switch up the other contestants’ fish, the competition starts to fire up.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: German urbanist Chris Dimmer focuses on the community-building potential of Japan's public bathhouses, or "Sento." He hopes that people living alone can rediscover the value of these bathhouses.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Nicoleta Oprisan from Romania is highly skilled at ikebana, the Japanese art of flower arranging. In a Japanophiles interview, she speaks about ikebana's power to communicate without words.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Aso Jinja
programme.desc: This shrine in Kumamoto Pref. was razed in the 2016 earthquake. The seven-year restoration fused traditional craftsmanship with the latest technology.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Perfect 2-Hour Guide: Kyoto
programme.desc: Take a journey through Kyoto's historic Kiyomizu-dera Temple, from its iconic stage and tranquil sacred spring. We unveil the definitive two-hour condensed course, while basking in springtime beauty.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Travel Iwate Pref. from popular destination Morioka to the Pacific coast. Eat your fill of soba noodles, dive into in a fantastical world, fish with cucumbers, and go spelunking.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at the significance of cats in Japan.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Evolving Renovations. New approaches use modern tech to reveal and showcase a building's history. From a historic florist to new approaches to office environments, explore renovations.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES Himeji The Defense
programme.desc: Himeji Castle with its white keep is one of Japan's most famous castles. But its beauty is deceiving. The paths to the keep follow the hill's gradient and hold many surprises for potential attackers.

programme.desc: Curry rice, one of Japan's most iconic national dishes. Why is this dish born in India so beloved by the Japanese?

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: What does it take to survive a flood? Japan has developed survival skills for floods through experiences such as typhoons. Find out how to safely navigate flooded streets and escape sinking cars.

programme.title: Carving the Spirit of Fishermen
programme.desc: Hokkaido / Takeya Takayuki (model maker) Fishing boats in the herring industry-which thrived here until the 1950s-featured swirling decorations that made a big impression on Takeya, a Hokkaido native.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kumander Bawang: Kalaban ng mga Aswang
programme.desc: Matang Bato is a small village which kept many dark mysteries in its past and they are starting to haunt them once again. Our unlikely hero, Tikboy was a frail teenager seeking to make his grandfather proud by joining in his Moro-Moro stage play. But little did he know there was more to his life than just being a stage actor. Suddenly monsters were appearing left and right, revived and controlled by their leader, Conde Regalado, they struck terror to the village. Acquiring the aid of old hermit, Tinyente Kulog, he learned about his past and how it will help save the villagers. Transformed into Kumander Bawang, armed with garlic bombs and superhuman strength, he ventured forth to end the battle that his father has started twenty years ago

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: IBLIS

programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. programme.title: Les Croquemoutard

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good man’s quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Neber 2-Geder
programme.desc: They were totally unlike in their ways and in the kind of girls they become attracted to. Andrew E and Redford White seemed like they were never together but each one was willing to do anything to help the other.

programme.title: Jack & Jill (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Everything in this tale seemed like a strange mix-up and you will find more in this utterly hilarious remake of a Mars Ravelo komiks classic.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Magdusa Ka (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Dina was the daughter of Dindo and his former maid, Nida. Aware of this fact, the girl constantly dreamt that one day she would be recognized by her father and would enjoy all the comforts of his moneyed lifestyle.

programme.title: Paracale Gang
programme.desc: Jay Manalo topbilled this action flick about six burly youngsters who would stop at nothing to redeem their once serene home. Complicating the buy off was not the price however. A villanous government official wanted to see them dead after the deal.

programme.title: Anino sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: Order to Kill
programme.desc: Order to Kill

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Brace for impact - 20 of the world's dumbest adrenaline junkies are about to hit your screen! We've got a wannabe astronaut taking one giant leap off a roof, a girl who plays chicken with a bull, and a hot-air balloon wedding that hits the ground screaming. With spine-tingling commentary from our hilariously hardcore cast.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: It's lights, camera, action on 20 of the most pinheaded performers ever to take the stage. From lion trainers under attack, to a sexy drum solo and a guy famous for smoking weed. They all share the spotlight with our cast of hilarious comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Britt!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 10
programme.desc: Papa Bear sees a clue in a bin that leads him to believe there's a shotgun hidden in it. Lori teams up with Jesse behind Brandon's back to win the big specialty item at the end of the day. Brandon's anger turns to joy once it's revealed to be an antique fire engine.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 11
programme.desc: At an auction set in wine and horse country, Jesse and David, aka the Leprechaun, spar over bins they hope will have wine in them. Brandon and Lori win a beautiful pristine horse trailer; but the real treasure turns out to be what's inside - a hot air balloon!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 12
programme.desc: Jesse wins a bin that turns out to include a giant pad for stuntmen to land on when they jump out of tall buildings. Meanwhile, Papa Bear wins a vintage 1970's British sportscar -but he can't fit into it!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 13
programme.desc: The grand finale is an airport auction with giant hangars filled with cool stuff, including arcade games, lighting equipment, and a vintage El Camino. The most unlikely team-up yet occurs when Brandon and Lori join forces with Mone to win the final item of the day - a helicopter!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 14
programme.desc: Sean tows a mysterious trailer to the auction and everyone wonders what's inside. T Money and Papa Bear battle over bins while Brandon and Lori play different kinds of games.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 13
programme.desc: What's one of Brooke's favorite pastimes when she's not hacking? Which lifesaving hack has Kevin used while swimming? Get the behind-the-scenes scoop on your favorite hacks on Inside Hacks!

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars in Semi-Pro, an outrageous comedy set in 1976 against the backdrop of the maverick ABA a wild and crazy basketball league that attempted to rival the NBA.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 9
programme.desc: Hoping that old toys bring new joy and lots of money, the Direstas attempt to create a giant Lite Brite coffee table.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 1
programme.desc: On the fifth season premiere, Penny worries that she's screwed things up permanently with her friends after her night with Raj, while Sheldon takes command of the paintball team.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 2
programme.desc: A battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya (AARTI MANN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 3
programme.desc: Attending a co-worker's wedding, Leonard and Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 4
programme.desc: When Raj is upset he's the only one of the four guys who's not in a relationship, Penny sets out to find the perfect date, introducing him to Emily, a girl he can actually talk to!

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 15
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. Sal, Murr, Q, and Joe serve up some mischief at White Castle, take on tourists in Times Square, and check out customers in a warehouse store.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys get liberal with lotion down at the shore, shop from other people's carts in a supermarket, and try to scam their way to a free dish of yogurt.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys approach strangers with humiliating one liners on the streets of New York, play a unique word game in a grocery store, and try to get shoppers to hop in a trunk at a car dealership.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys tackle speed dating with the world's worst pickup lines, read phony fortunes on the boardwalk, and get too personal with shoppers in the hygiene aisle of apharmacy.

programme.title: Friends S5 22
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler take a road trip to Las Vegas, where Joey has landed the lead role in a movie. But the two argue and Joey goes on alone. Rachel has an eye infection.

programme.title: Friends S5 23
programme.desc: The gang decides to go out to Las Vegas to surprise Joey and to celebrate Monica's and Chandler's one-year anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S5 24
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler get lucky in Las Vegas, Nevada. Rachel makes Ross regret playing a prank on her. Joey schemes for fame and fortune.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 1
programme.desc: Michael shocks a receptionist with a medical procedure that leaves both their jaws on the floor, and then at a party store, Michael reveals a regenerating piece of gum. Plus, an electrifying trick rewrites history.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 1
programme.desc: News of the tornado reaches Sheldon and Mary in Germany. Also, with the Cooper house in chaos, Missy steps up, on the season seven premiere of YOUNG SHELDON.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 2
programme.desc: Sheldon realizes he is the weakest student in his class; Meemaw is looking to expand her gambling business.

programme.title: Gangster Squad
programme.desc: A stylish retelling of how LAPD takes back their nascent city from one of the most dangerous mafia bosses of all time.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers – and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Friends S6 2
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica tell Joey and Rachel that they want to live together. Monica is hurt that Rachel doesn't react as strongly as Joey. Phoebe tries to find out how Ross really feels about Rachel.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 4
programme.desc: Michael shows off a seashell from the seashore - that still has the seashore in it - and reveals desserts that break the mold. Plus, at a farm, Michael startles his assistant with a trick that's "out-of-this-world".

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 5
programme.desc: Michael turns iced tea into a tea candle and later, at a pet store, he reveals that caterpillars have wicks. Plus, at a warehouse, Michael stumps his assistant when he proves that big tricks come in shrink-wrapped packages.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 6
programme.desc: In an ice cream shop, Michael whips up a mind-boggling app at a party store, he spills the tea on a self-brewing decoration| and at a farm, Michael's helper looks like he saw a ghost after a run-in with a spirited scarecrow.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 7
programme.desc: At a cooking class, Michael gets crabby when chopping salad and brings the heat to instantly cook a meatball with his breath. And later, Michael chills his assistant to her bones when a cryotherapy experiment freezes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 8
programme.desc: Michael explores the true depth of a deep-dish pizza, and later, he plays doctor to a patient questioning his own vision and sanity. Plus, as a locksmith, Michael stuns his assistant with a surprise on the other side of the door.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 9
programme.desc: Michael gives a confused woman the license to speed at the DMV, unclogs a "crumby" toaster at a return counter, and blows the mind of a beach attendant with a scaly encounter from under the sea!

programme.title: The Flash S9 11
programme.desc: Iris is alarmed by Barry’s disappearance and Cecile assures her everything will be ok, but does she know that for certain? Team Flash is affected by a mysterious substance.

programme.title: The Flash S9 12
programme.desc: Team Flash works together to figure out how to protect Barry, all while being very careful who they trust. Cecile is skeptical of the plan after an unsuccessful attempt.

programme.title: The Flash S9 13
programme.desc: The Flash, the fastest man alive, is tasked with his greatest challenge yet, to save the timeline and save existence. Friends gather to save Central City, one last time.
